birth_place.zh-cn: 中华民国江苏省盐城县葛武镇郝荣村
birth_place.en: Haorong Village, Gewu Town, Yancheng County, Jiangsu Province, Republic of China

death_place.zh-cn: 台北市内湖区三军总医院
death_place.en: Tri-Service General Hospital, Neihu District, Taipei City

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领、政治人物，曾任中国国民党副主席、行政院院长、国防部部长、陆军一级上将。
description.en: A military general and politician of the Republic of China, who served as Vice Chairman of the Kuomintang, Premier of the Republic of China, Minister of National Defense, and a General of the Army.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任中华民国总统、中国国民党主席。在行政院长任命、军事人事及权力归属等议题上与郝柏村发生严重冲突，最终迫使其辞职。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician, former President of the Republic of China and Chairman of the Kuomintang. He had serious conflicts with Hau Pei-tsun over issues such as the appointment of the Premier, military personnel matters, and the locus of power, ultimately forcing Hau's resignation.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的执政党之一，郝柏村长期为其党员，并曾担任副主席。
description.en: One of the ruling parties of the Republic of China. Hau Pei-tsun was a long-term member and once served as its Vice Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国最高行政机关，郝柏村曾于1990年至1993年担任院长。
description.en: The highest administrative organ of the Republic of China, where Hau Pei-tsun served as Premier from 1990 to 1993.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，郝柏村的前任行政院院长。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, and Hau Pei-tsun's predecessor as Premier of the Executive Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，郝柏村的继任行政院院长。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, and Hau Pei-tsun's successor as Premier of the Executive Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任中华民国总统。他任命郝柏村为参谋总长，并定下晋升一级上将的不成文规矩。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who served as President. He appointed Hau Pei-tsun as Chief of the General Staff and established the unwritten rule for promotion to General of the Army.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事及政治领导人，曾任中华民国总统。郝柏村曾担任其侍卫长。
description.en: A military and political leader of the Republic of China, who served as President. Hau Pei-tsun once served as his Aide-de-camp General.

description.zh-cn: 1958年发生于金门及其周边的一场战役。时任第九师师长的郝柏村率部戍守小金门并因此战役立功。
description.en: A military conflict that took place in Kinmen and its surrounding areas in 1958. Hau Pei-tsun, then commander of the 9th Division, defended Lesser Kinmen and was decorated for his service in the battle.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治评论家、社会活动家，《自由时代周刊》创办人。生前常以政论文字抨击郝柏村的党军意识及强人干政。
description.en: A Taiwanese political commentator, social activist, and founder of Freedom Era Weekly. He often criticized Hau Pei-tsun's party-army ideology and strongman politics in his political commentaries.

description.zh-cn: 台湾主要政党之一。在郝柏村被提名为行政院院长时，该党曾发起“反军人干政大游行”表示反对。
description.en: One of Taiwan's major political parties. When Hau Pei-tsun was nominated as Premier, the party launched the "Protest Against Military Interference in Politics" to express its opposition.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军一级上将。时任总统李登辉意图将其晋升为一级上将，但遭到时任行政院长郝柏村的强烈反对与拒绝副署，此事加剧了李郝二人的矛盾。
description.en: A General of the Army in the Republic of China Army. Then-President Lee Teng-hui intended to promote him to General of the Army, but faced strong opposition and refusal to countersign from then-Premier Hau Pei-tsun, an incident that intensified the conflict between Lee and Hau.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，郑南榕遗孀。在立法院率先质询并揭露时任行政院长郝柏村召开“体制外军事会议”，侵犯总统统帅权。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China and the widow of Cheng Nan-jung. In the Legislative Yuan, she was the first to question and expose then-Premier Hau Pei-tsun for holding "extra-constitutional military meetings," thereby encroaching on the President's power of supreme command.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任司法院长。因与李登辉理念不合，1996年与郝柏村搭档参选中华民国总统选举。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who served as President of the Judicial Yuan. Due to ideological differences with Lee Teng-hui, he partnered with Hau Pei-tsun to run in the 1996 ROC presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国第九届总统、副总统选举，也是首次直接民选。郝柏村与林洋港搭档参选，最终落败。
description.en: The 9th presidential and vice-presidential election of the Republic of China, and the first direct election. Hau Pei-tsun ran as the vice-presidential candidate with Lin Yang-kang, but they were defeated.

description.zh-cn: 导致郝柏村逝世的直接原因。
description.en: The direct cause of Hau Pei-tsun's death.

description.zh-cn: 郝柏村的妻子。
description.en: Wife of Hau Pei-tsun.

description.zh-cn: 郝柏村的长子，中国国民党籍政治人物，曾任台北市市长。
description.en: Eldest son of Hau Pei-tsun, a KMT politician who served as Mayor of Taipei.

description.zh-cn: 郝柏村的父亲。
description.en: Father of Hau Pei-tsun.

description.zh-cn: 郝柏村的母亲。
description.en: Mother of Hau Pei-tsun.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事院校，郝柏村毕业于其第12期砲兵科。
description.en: A military academy of the Republic of China, from which Hau Pei-tsun graduated from the 12th class of the artillery branch.

nodes.id: 美国陆军指挥参谋学院

zh-cn: 美国陆军指挥参谋学院
en: United States Army Command and General Staff College

description.zh-cn: 位于美国的军事院校，郝柏村曾在此留学深造。
description.en: A military academy in the United States where Hau Pei-tsun pursued further studies.

description.zh-cn: 郝绪龄是郝柏村的父亲。
description.en: Hao Xuling was Hau Pei-tsun's father.

description.zh-cn: 袁珍宝是郝柏村的母亲。
description.en: Yuan Zhenbao was Hau Pei-tsun's mother.

description.zh-cn: 郝龙斌是郝柏村的长子。
description.en: Hau Lung-pin is the eldest son of Hau Pei-tsun.

description.zh-cn: 郝柏村与郭菀华于1950年结婚，直至郭菀华于2018年逝世。
description.en: Hau Pei-tsun and Kuo Wan-hua were married in 1950 until her death in 2018.

description.zh-cn: 郝柏村于1935年考入中央陆军军官学校第12期砲兵科，1938年提前毕业。
description.en: Hau Pei-tsun was admitted to the 12th class of the artillery branch at the Central Military Academy in 1935 and graduated early in 1938.

description.zh-cn: 1963年，郝柏村在中华民国特别班第一期留学。
description.en: In 1963, Hau Pei-tsun studied in the first special class for the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 在八二三砲战期间，郝柏村担任第九师师长，负责戍守小金门，并因此战役立功。
description.en: During the Second Taiwan Strait Crisis, Hau Pei-tsun served as the commander of the 9th Division, responsible for defending Lesser Kinmen, and was decorated for his service.

description.zh-cn: 郝柏村于1965年至1970年间担任总统蒋中正的侍卫长。
description.en: Hau Pei-tsun served as Aide-de-camp General to President Chiang Kai-shek from 1965 to 1970.

description.zh-cn: 时任总统蒋经国晋任郝柏村为国防部参谋总长，并晋升其为一级上将。
description.en: Then-President Chiang Ching-kuo appointed Hau Pei-tsun as Chief of the General Staff of the Ministry of National Defense and promoted him to General of the Army.

description.zh-cn: 总统李登辉任命时任国防部长的郝柏村转任行政院院长，此举被外界解读为意在剥夺其军权。
description.en: President Lee Teng-hui appointed then-Minister of National Defense Hau Pei-tsun as Premier of the Executive Yuan, a move interpreted by outsiders as intended to strip him of his military power.

description.zh-cn: 在李登辉提名郝柏村组阁后，民主进步党发起“反军人干政大游行”以示反对。
description.en: After Lee Teng-hui nominated Hau Pei-tsun to form a cabinet, the Democratic Progressive Party launched a "Protest Against Military Interference in Politics" to show its opposition.

description.zh-cn: 郝柏村在行政院长任内，因召开军事会议、反对蒋仲苓晋升案等事与总统李登辉发生严重权力冲突，最终被李登辉迫使辞职，并因理念不合而退出国民党。
description.en: During his tenure as Premier, Hau Pei-tsun had serious power struggles with President Lee Teng-hui over issues such as holding military meetings and opposing Chiang Chung-ling's promotion. He was ultimately forced by Lee to resign and later left the KMT due to ideological differences.

description.zh-cn: 《自由时代周刊》创办人郑南榕生前常以政论文字抨击时任参谋总长郝柏村为“军头”，批评其党军意识与强人干政。
description.en: Cheng Nan-jung, founder of Freedom Era Weekly, often used political commentary to criticize then-Chief of the General Staff Hau Pei-tsun as a "military strongman," attacking his party-army ideology and strongman politics.

description.zh-cn: 时任立法委员叶菊兰质询并揭露行政院长郝柏村召开“体制外军事会议”，指其侵犯了总统的军事统帅权，引发重大争议。
description.en: Then-Legislator Yeh Chu-lan questioned and exposed Premier Hau Pei-tsun for holding "extra-constitutional military meetings," accusing him of infringing on the president's supreme command of the military, which sparked significant controversy.

description.zh-cn: 时任行政院长郝柏村强烈反对并拒绝副署总统李登辉对总统府参军长蒋仲苓的一级上将晋升案，导致该任命案最终搁置。
description.en: Then-Premier Hau Pei-tsun strongly opposed and refused to countersign President Lee Teng-hui's proposed promotion of Aide-de-camp General Chiang Chung-ling to General of the Army, causing the appointment to be shelved.

description.zh-cn: 1992年立法院改选后，总统李登辉以“建立行政院向立法院负责”为名，要求并最终迫使郝柏村辞去行政院长职务。
description.en: After the 1992 Legislative Yuan election, President Lee Teng-hui, under the rationale of "establishing the Executive Yuan's accountability to the Legislative Yuan," demanded and ultimately forced Hau Pei-tsun to resign from his position as Premier.

description.zh-cn: 因与国民党主流派理念不合，林洋港与郝柏村共同退出国民党，并搭档参选1996年中华民国总统、副总统选举。
description.en: Due to ideological disagreements with the KMT's mainstream faction, Lin Yang-kang and Hau Pei-tsun both withdrew from the KMT and ran together as a ticket in the 1996 ROC presidential and vice-presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 郝柏村作为副总统候选人，与总统候选人林洋港搭档参与了1996年的选举。
description.en: Hau Pei-tsun participated in the 1996 election as the vice-presidential candidate, running with presidential candidate Lin Yang-kang.

description.zh-cn: 郝柏村因年事已高造成多重器官衰竭，于2020年3月30日在三军总医院离世。
description.en: Hau Pei-tsun passed away at the Tri-Service General Hospital on March 30, 2020, due to multiple organ failure caused by old age.
